item.title: 2025 has been the pinnacle of weird and interesting videogames, and for me, not a single one can define the year as a whole
item.description:

2025 has been the pinnacle of weird and interesting videogames, and for me, not a single one can define the year as a whole

A veritable pick ’n’ mix of everything tasty is now my only option for the 2025 big picture.
